org.eleusoft.uri
Interface URICodec

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApacheURICodec
public interface URICodec

Providers Only

Author:
mik

Method Summary
 java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String encoded, java.lang.String encoding)
          Decodes an percent-escaped string following URI rules and using the passed encoding.
 java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String decoded, java.lang.String encoding)
          Percent-escapes a string following rules for single param name or param value of a URI query component and using the passed encoding.
 

Method Detail

decode

java.lang.String decode(java.lang.String encoded,
                        java.lang.String encoding)
                        throws URIException
Decodes an percent-escaped string following URI rules and using the passed encoding.

Note: + remains +, while following URL rules it becomes a space.

Returns:
the decoded string, never null
Throws:
URIException - when
  • The syntax of the escaped uri is wrong.

encode

java.lang.String encode(java.lang.String decoded,
                        java.lang.String encoding)
Percent-escapes a string following rules for single param name or param value of a URI query component and using the passed encoding.

Returns:
the percent-escaped string, never null
